nodes.text: Glurrg was a male pirate who served under Captain Huba in the Indobok Pirates.

Formerly a cook along with the rest of the gang, he was forced to work in a crystal mine after Olag Greck framed the chefs for an attempted poisoning of Boonda the Hutt. After escaping the mine, he helped steal the Tharen Wayfarer from the Pitareeze family.
